name: Chocolate Lava Cake
detail: A rich and decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Classic Tiramisu
detail: A traditional Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.

name: Margherita Pizza
detail: Classic pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
detail: A delicious pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
detail: Pizza with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.

name: Caesar Salad
detail: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
detail: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, red onions, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

name: Caprese Salad
detail: Sliced fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil, seasoned with salt and olive oil.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
detail: Rich and creamy tomato soup infused with fresh basil leaves.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
detail: Classic soup with tender chicken, noodles, carrots, celery, and herbs.
